profiles.name: base
profiles.description: The base setup for the service.

blocks.name: networking_interfaces
blocks.description: Settings related to the network interfaces used in the system.

settings.name: service.interfaces
settings.description: The only interface needed is internal since this service is only used by other services.

settings.name: service.interfaces.internal.type
settings.description: The java class of the interface.

settings.name: service.interfaces.internal.endpoints
settings.description: The endpoint location(s) for this interface.

settings.name: service.interfaces.internal.connector
settings.description: The connector configuration to use for the interface.

settings.name: service.interfaces.admin.endpoints
settings.description: Admin interface is included by default and the same settings can be set like any HTTP interface, but endpoint is required.

blocks.name: networking_connectors
blocks.description: Group of settings related to the connectors used by HTTP interfaces.

settings.name: service.http_connectors
settings.description: The names of the connector configurations available to the system.

settings.name: service.http_connectors.standard.idle_timeout
settings.description: Amount of time to wait, in milliseconds, before a connection is considered idle.

settings.name: service.http_connectors.standard.max_form_content_size
settings.description: The maximum number of bytes that a single request is allowed to send to the service.

blocks.name: object_id_types
blocks.description: The types support by the object id service.

settings.name: id_source.types
settings.description: The types this service will generate object ids for.

settings.name: id_source.types.device
settings.value: [id,2][name,device][description,Represents a device that belongs to a user]

blocks.name: object_id_service
blocks.description: The object id service specific setting.

settings.name: service.type
settings.description: The Java class of the service to run.

settings.name: id_source.localhost.source_id
settings.description: The setting id_source.hostname must be passed in on the command line and it will be used to find this source_id.

settings.name: id_source.data_directory
settings.description: The directory where data will be saved to disk. This is a path relative to the starting location of the service.

profiles.name: development
profiles.description: The development overrides for the service. If you wish to change values for development purposes, create your own profile and extend development.
